post:
Recent News
Atlanta Location Launch - We are pleased to further expand our partnership with Digital Realty opening our location in 56 Marietta, Atlanta. Launching with GTT and Telia alongside IX connections with Digital Realty IX & Community IX Atlanta extending our MPLS network to the new region over our core network.
Local Mitigation Integration - We have expanded our partnership with Corero with local appliances in all of our locations (Los Angeles, New York City, London, Amsterdam and Frankfurt) offering in-house, on premise mitigation capabilities with in portal reporting of attacks and mitigation.
Transatlantic Network Expansion - Our own network now runs across the transatlantic with our own private fibres allowing us to provision reserved and guaranteed cross continent connectivity for customers who require dedicated connectivity between these regions.
Additional Network Expansion - Additional links with Telia and GTT in the US are live alongside new IX memberships are live improving all our customers connectivity.

What sets us apart?
-Juniper only network with new equipment.
-Multi 100Gbps core network (2.9+ Tbps Total Capacity) with N+1 resiliency at minimum and diverse routing.
-Great peering at Equinix IX London, AMS-IX, DE-CIX, Digital Realty IX, DE-CIX NY, Any2 IX, Digital Realty IX & Community IX Atlanta to local ISP’s and private peering directly with Liberty Global and Google.
-We transit with: Level3, Telia, NTT, GTT, TATA and Cogent which guarantees excellent, congestion free connectivity
-LINX, LONAP and AMS-IX partner - we can connect you to these exchanges with your own ASN.
-Cross Continent MPLS Network Spread over 11 data centres.
-Tier 3 Data centres in Los Angeles, Atlanta, New York City, London, Amsterdam & Frankfurt.
-Value added services included; free DirectAdmin licensing, complimentary best effort DDoS protection, free Acronis 50GB offsite backup for internal services.
-We aim at high quality for a reasonable price.
-Clouvider is an established, growing, 6 year old UK based business.

So where are the offers?
Our current dedicated server offers for Los Angeles, Atlanta, New York City, London, Amsterdam and Frankfurt can be seen on our Dedicated Server Sale Page, subject to availability. If it’s not listed its gone!

FAQ’s:

Can these servers be customised?
Yes, we have several options during the checkout process for our systems. If you seek a different configuration than listed please contact us.

Can I check your network?
Yes, our Looking Glass can be found at https://as62240.net/

How long for deployment?
Our standard delivery is within 5 working days due to the current situation around the world. Custom configurations may take longer.

Do you offer IPMI Access?
Yes, free VPN Secured IPMI access can be provided on request.

Do you offer IPv6?
Yes, /64 or /48 subnets can be requested during the order process.

Can you accommodate x, y or z?
Open a sales ticket to discuss our custom solutions, happy to help where possible.

Any questions or queries?
Contact our team today at https://www.clouvider.co.uk/contact/

All prices are exclusive of VAT where applicable. Stock is limited and the offers are valid subject to stock remaining. Because of the limited stock, if the order is not paid within an hour, it will be regretfully cancelled and the stock returned to the pool for others to enjoy. Subject to our standard Terms & Conditions https://www.clouvider.co.uk/terms-conditions. Cancellation notice period applies. Offer valid whilst promotional stocks last or until the 30th September 2020, whichever comes first.
